description.english: Generate your first Energy L1!
description.german: Du hast erstmals die Energie Stufe 1 erreicht!
description.italian: Genera la tua prima Energia L1!
description.brazilian: Crie a sua primeira Energia Nv. 1!

description.english: Receive a wave from a carrybot!
description.german: Nimm etwas von einem Träger-Bot in Empfang!
description.italian: Ricevi un saluto da un BotTrasportatore!
description.brazilian: Receba um aceno de um carregabot!

description.english: Transport a resource between harbours with a boat.
description.german: Transportiere etwas mit einem Boot zwischen zwei Häfen!
description.italian: Trasporta una risorsa tra due porti con una barca.
description.brazilian: Transporte um recurso entre portos com um barco.

description.english: Generate your first Energy L2!
description.german: Du hast erstmals die Energie Stufe 2 erreicht!

description.english: Generate your first Energy L3!
description.german: Du hast erstmals die Energie Stufe 3 erreicht!
description.italian: Genera la tua prima Energia L3!
description.brazilian: You've created your first Energy L3!

description.english: Transport a resource between train stations using a train.
description.german: Transportiere einen Rohstoff zwischen zwei Bahnhöfen mit einem Zug.
description.italian: Trasporta una risorsa tra due stazioni ferroviarie con un treno.
description.brazilian: Transporte um recurso entre estações com um trem.

description.english: Research all the technologies within 1 year 6 months
